title: Companies
content:
Companies

State Regulations
§ 127.100 - Hempstead and Oyster Bay Water Company
§ 127.101 - Long Island Water Corporation (Baldwin, Roosevelt, Hempstead Villa, Lakeview and Valley Stream)
§ 127.102 - New York Water Service Corporation (City of Glen Cove)
§ 127.103 - Sea Cliff Water Company

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
